attributes.additional_details: Abbeytown Juniors FC currently field eighteen teams in The Carlisle Glass Youth Football League. The League management committee have decided to expel the club for next season 2014/2015 citing a shortage of referees and facilities in Carlisle. This will result in our teams having to make the long journey to Egremont, Cleator Moor and Whitehaven. This will place a considerable financial strain on our parents and carers. If you would like to register your support in our opposition to this expulsion please enter your details below:

rejection.details: Maybe something you can raise with your MP?
